column2: ENGLISH
Go on a Viking!
While I may be unable to muster the hosts for grand raids as the larger chiefs, I may rally a few boats to my name to trade, explore and plunder. Time to go on a viking!
Return home
The harvest waits and our longboats are already full of gains.
Surprised by knights!
As you and your men plunder, you are beset by a group of heavily armed knights!
To Valhalla!
He who runs away, lives to plunder another day!
As the months pass, the men begin to get restless for home and wives...
Let us get home!
Just one... more... village...
A small fishing village has been spotted!
Pillage!
Trade!
Leave!
A fishing village has been spotted!
A monastery has been spotted!
At first, the creaking of the longboat could have been anything... but as the creature got into sight, there could be no doubt. The Kraken!
Valhalla awaits!
Every man for himself!
A town has been spotted!
An armed merchant ship has been spotted!
Some of your less-than-loyal subjects have used the opportunity provided by you being on viking to try to seize power!
Why can't they let me have any fun?
With the ships heavy with gold and valuables, most of your men see no reason to continue on the raid...
Time to return to our farms!
Heavy with riches? NOT ANY MORE!
It might be time to raid and trade once more...
Ja!
